content.text: What do you do to free your mind from feeling down? I look up at the stars at night.
I have always been a fan of astronomy and I love to stargaze. I find it so calming and peaceful.
Same here. It's like I'm the only person in the world when I'm out in the mountains looking up at the stars.
I love the feeling of being small and insignificant in the grand scheme of things. It puts my problems into perspective and helps me to appreciate the beauty of the universe.
I feel the same way. It's amazing to think that there are so many stars out there and that each one is a sun.
It really is. I also like to think about the fact that there are probably other planets out there with life on them.
I love that idea too! It's so exciting to think that we might not be alone in the universe.
It is! I think it's something that everyone should think about at least once in their lives.
I agree. It's a really amazing thought.
It is. I'm glad we share the same interest in astronomy.
Me too. It's always nice to talk to someone who understands the beauty of the night sky.
It is. I'm glad we met.
